pages.text: We will need a few resources to get started. For the initial set-up we will need 8 iron ingots, 8 redstone dust, 3 copper ingots, 16 lead ingots, 6 rubber, some wood and two furnaces, but feel free to collect more, especially iron. First craft 4 batteries.
We need to refine our iron to be able to craft a basic machine frame. You can't have too much refined iron ingots.
The frame is a common ingredient in TechReborn and the main reason we need so much iron. Craft one for the next chapter.
